text: Nguoi (hoi Thien Su) hay noi: “Cai xau va cai tot khong he ngang bang nhau mac du su phong phu cua cai xau co the gay an tuong voi cac nguoi (boi le so nhieu khong phai la bang chung khang đinh gia tri cua mot su viec). Cho nen, cac nguoi hay kinh so Allah, hoi nhung nguoi thong hieu, mong rang cac nguoi thang loi va thanh cong
